channel.title: PI [Npc shouting if owner is online]
channel.description: Can someone give me the code so that an npc shouts if the owner is online or offline

item.title: PI [Npc shouting if owner is online]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

NPCHandler.java:

Add:

(Still in npchandler)

Find:
public void process() {
Under:

		for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCs; i++) {
			if (npcs[i] != null) {

Add:

                if (npcs[i].npcType == 0) { // NPC ID 0 is Hans, you can change it if you want.. :durr:
                    if (ownerIsOn) {
                            npcs[i].forceChat("The Owner is online!");
                    } else{
                            npcs[i].forceChat("The Owner is offline!");
                    }
                     npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                }

Client.java under:

	public void initialize() {
		synchronized (this) {

Add:

			if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ownername")){
				NPCHandler.ownerIsOn = true;
			}

(Client.java still)
Under:
public void destruct() {
Add:

			if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ownername")){
				NPCHandler.ownerIsOn = false;
			}

Theoretically, that will work.

Read full topic
